newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Victor CSD, N.Y.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Victor CSD, N.Y.

text.p: in the Counties of Ontario, Monroe and Wayne
at Hawkins,Delafield &Wood, 67 Wall Street, New York, New
Bonds dated April 15, 1997, interest June 15 and December 15 each year commencing December 15, 1997. Bonds mature in principal installments on June 15 as follows:

The District reserves the right to change the time and/or date of the bid opening, and notice thereof shall be provided at least 24 hours prior to the time set forth above and transmitted over the Munifacts wire.
Bids, accompanied by $269,100 good faith deposit check, must be for all $13,455,000 bonds. Award shall be based on net interest cost.

Bidders must refer to the full Notice of Sale for the complete terms and conditions of the sale. Copies of said Notice and the Official Statement may be promptly obtained from Fiscal Advisors &Marketing, Inc., Cicero Professional Building, 6221 Route 31, Suite 112, Cicero, New York 13039, telephone number: (315) 699-7912; fax: (315) 699-8833.
Additional Official Statements may be downloaded from Fiscal Advisors &Marketing, Inc.'s Internet address:
President of the Board of Education
